rbp_internal_size.help: If not defined default size is 4K*#enteries/32

internal_base_address.help: If not defined the default is the first sector after the application code ends.

blockdevice.help: Options are default, SPIF, DATAFASH, QSPIF or SD

external_size.help: Size of the external block device

external_base_address.help: If not defined the default is from address 0
